topics.body:
Hey!
You guys won't believe what happened with me today at work!
While I was on a errand delivering something to a client. In the subway while waiting for the next train to arrive, I sat down at a bench. Beside me was a shopping bag that had something in it. I asked people around me who the bag belonged to, nobody claimed it. I took the bag as soon as the train arrived, looked inside. To my surprise, I found 5 unopened cans of BEER! Usually they come on 6 can bundles, but one was missing, I assume whoever left the bag there drank one and accidentally left the rest there.
Tis a good day.

topics.body:
So I'm looking at the latest twitter trend of "thingsjesusneversaid"

Delicious delicious drama everywhere. . . . Before you ask it's the good type of drama of watching people that have never actually read the bible essentially go, "fuck you for asking me to cite the bible for things I say".

The drama in a nutshell:
"Jesus said to kill gays"
#thingsjesusneversaid, "Citation needed"
"Fuck you for asking for citation!  Asking for evidence is religious discrimination!"
